title: Easier Research Software Engineering
text: goal rsetools make research software engineering easier.

title: Easier Research Software Engineering
text: can install development version rsetools GitHub :

title: Easier Research Software Engineering
code: library(rsetools)  use_dictionary(mtcars) #> # A tibble: 11 × 4 #>    dataset name  typeof definition #>    <chr>   <chr> <chr>  <chr>      #>  1 mtcars  mpg   double <NA>       #>  2 mtcars  cyl   double <NA>       #>  3 mtcars  disp  double <NA>       #>  4 mtcars  hp    double <NA>       #>  5 mtcars  drat  double <NA>       #>  6 mtcars  wt    double <NA>       #>  7 mtcars  qsec  double <NA>       #>  8 mtcars  vs    double <NA>       #>  9 mtcars  am    double <NA>       #> 10 mtcars  gear  double <NA>       #> 11 mtcars  carb  double <NA>

title: Draft a data dictionary — use_dictionary
code: use_dictionary(mtcars) #> # A tibble: 11 × 4 #>    dataset name  typeof definition #>    <chr>   <chr> <chr>  <chr>      #>  1 mtcars  mpg   double NA         #>  2 mtcars  cyl   double NA         #>  3 mtcars  disp  double NA         #>  4 mtcars  hp    double NA         #>  5 mtcars  drat  double NA         #>  6 mtcars  wt    double NA         #>  7 mtcars  qsec  double NA         #>  8 mtcars  vs    double NA         #>  9 mtcars  am    double NA         #> 10 mtcars  gear  double NA         #> 11 mtcars  carb  double NA
